how_to_title: How to Unlock PDF Online for Free
how_to_step_one: Click on the 'Choose File' button and select or drag and drop the PDF file you want to unlock.
how_to_step_three: Click ‘Download’ to download your Unlocked PDF.
how_to_step_two: Fill in the password and confirm password fields and click on the Unlock button.
feature_five_text: This tool is designed for all users, advanced knowledge is not required. So, It's easy to unlock PDF files.
feature_four_text: Working with Unlock PDF tool is absolutely secure. We do not save passwords and files are deleted permanently after one hour.
feature_one_text: Thanks to its powerful processing capabilities, this tool is able to unlock PDF file in a shorter amount of time.
feature_six_text: You can access or use the Unlock PDF Tool online on the Internet using any browser from any operating system.
feature_three_text: Remove password protection from your PDF files and avoid the inconvenience of not having access to important information.
feature_two_text: You can use this Unlock PDF tool online for free and with no limits on the number of times you can use it to unlock PDF files.
page_header_text: Unlock PDF files quickly and easily online for free
